attr.title: Legend of Xenia 2
attr.desc: Tiny Zelda-like with a resolution of just 64x64 pixels. Also it's a sequel to Legend of Xenia so that's cool I guess.
attr.inst: Download the windows version of the game from https://itch.io/queue/c/371408/legend-of-xenia?game_id=168318 and extract data.win to /ports/LegendofXenia2/gamedata.
